description: HubSpot offers a full platform of marketing, sales, customer service, and CRM software — plus the methodology, resources, and support — to help businesses ...
name: HubSpot
plugin_instructions:
Go to your HubSpot Account > Settings > Integrations > Private Apps > Create private app > Enter your Basic Info > Scopes select contacts, deals & quotes (read and write)

Copy the Private App Access Token to the plugin as
Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN

User ID. You can find it in your HubSpot dashboard URL

If you have an issue contact us directly here
I2B Plugin Support
https://i2b.co/plugins-support
